title: Bug 10403: Project creation confirmation for scrubbing bin directory
OB: When a user creates a new project for an existing directory structure and points the output folder at a bin directory, the confirmation for scrubbing the bin directory is not provided.
EB: When a user creates a new project for an existing directory structure and points the output folder at a bin directory, the confirmation for scrubbing the bin directory should be provided.
SR: To reproduce the issue, create a new project for an existing directory structure. Point the output folder at a bin directory that contains more than just .class files. Observe that the confirmation for scrubbing the bin directory is not shown.
